manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: S&T INC. Coffee Mat Make your morning ritual easier and more enjoyable with S&T INC.'s Coffee Mat. Perfect for sliding appliances out from under cabinets to refill water, the mat catches water, grounds, cream, and sugar when brewing to make coffee cleanup as smooth as your morning cup.

Protect Surfaces S&T INC.'s Coffee Mat is a simple, functional way to keep counters clean from coffee spills. Save surfaces from scratches and protect countertops from splashes and stains. Learn More Contain Spills & Splashes An absorbent fabric sheet with an inner water-resistant layer, this unique mat protects counters and other surfaces from accidental spills, splashes, and coffee stains. Learn More Reversible Design With a coffee-themed print on one side and a solid color on the other, these low profile mats will fit your home décor and coffee station area perfectly. Learn More Glide & Slide with Ease Low hanging cabinets? No problem. Effortlessly slide your coffee maker forward for easy water and bean refills, while also protecting the bottom of cabinets from steam as you brew your coffee. Learn More Cut-to-Fit Cut the Coffee Mat to fit your needs for different sized makers, trays, coffee bars, and more. The best part... the unique fabric won't fray! Learn More

Simple Idea Great Performance Prevent messy drips and keep your kitchen stylish with these durable mats. Wherever you house your coffee maker, you can cut these mats to fit any space. Place under your coffee maker to stop spillage when filling up your cup or mug. Even if you get a little mess on the mat, you can just throw it in the wash!

What size is the S&T INC. Coffee Mat? Our Brown Typography, Coffee, and House Blend mats are 12 inches x 18 inches. The Coffee Bean print is 14 inches x 20 inches. All fabric mats can be cut to fit your unique space! What material is this made of? The Coffee Mats are made of 100% mixed fibers: viscose, polyester, and olefin. Are these mats machine washable? Yes! Machine wash separately with a liquid detergent and before first use. These mats are not pre-shrunk; expect some shrinkage and softening after washing. This will not affect product performance. Do not use bleach. Lay flat to dry. Do not iron. Can I use this as a trivet mat? No, the mat is not intended for use as a trivet mat or a hot pad.

It's our job to make impactful changes for our customers & our planet S&T INC. is proud to be a member of amfori, the leading business association for open and sustainable trade. amfori empowers over 2,000 members worldwide by monitoring and improving social performance in their supply chains and shaping a policy environment that enables them to operate efficiently and sustainably. For more information, visit www.amfori.org.

Real Products, Designed by Real People Life Hacks That Actually Work You see an interesting way to make a routine in your life easier and decide to try it out. Unfortunately, it turns out that your expectation didn't quite match up with reality. It happens! That's why we've personally tested each and every one of our products – of course for quality, but also to ensure that it does exactly what you expect it to do. We're here in St. Louis, Missouri, thinking, designing, and testing products to solve problems and make your life a little bit easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the perfect protective mat for under my coffee maker at home. It protects my counter, it's very easy to wipe up any spills and messes, and I can still easily move my coffee pot forward and back to fill the water tank... the machine does not stick to it. It isn't thick at all, it's very thin and flexible so it seamlessly covers the counter. This is a well designed product and it's perfect for my needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed an absorbent mat under my keurig and this works great and looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Absorbs coffee drips when pouring.
reviews.reviewText: Good color when holding moisture it’s not as noticeable. Wish it was a little bigger. Washes and drys well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A wonderful addition to keep my kitchen clean and tidy
reviews.reviewText: I first bought this item almost 15 years ago now, and after much use along with the wear-and-tear of keeping things clean, I found this replacement, which exactly matches the original.This is a great find for anyone who has a coffee service in their kitchen and who understands that people will spill coffee or milk or sweeteners on the counter but they want to keep it looking neat.This thing absorbs coffee and milk spills, and rinses out with hot water (if it's just coffee or tea) or with a little bit of soapy water (if it's milk).I love this design, but I'm sure than any design offered here would work as well.Very very satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to my coffee station at home.
reviews.reviewText: What did I ever do without these? They are the best; they absorb all the miss pours from our coffee pot. Best part aside from the absorbing power, they can be tossed in the washer and dryer, and they come out like new. Highly recommend this item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Easy To Clean
reviews.reviewText: The size is perfect. What was not, was easily cut off with regular scissors. The look is super cute on my coffee bar. Not easy to clean. I can wipe down with a rag, but one time in a wash and it was destroyed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and washable
reviews.reviewText: Love this for the coffee bar area on my quartz kitchen counter.Coffee, sugar, drips, etc, are easily shaken off to keep the area clean, and I was mine about once a week. (I used to waste a lot of paper towels and disinfectant wipes with cleaning up spills and leaks. )

reviews.reviewTitle: Está bien, pero es delgada y un poco impráctica
reviews.reviewText: El producto es un mantel de plástico. La parte inferior es adherente, lo cual lo hace un poco complicado en su manejo; por esto mismo, se adhiere cualquier partícula, miga, o pelusa. La parte de superior es menos adherente pero porosa y también difícil de limpiar, aún con detergente líquido y agua. En conclusión: sirve, y cumple, pero no es lo mejor.
Perfect for under my coffee maker to catch and leaks. It does not budge on my butcher block counter top and is easy to wipe any coffee spills.

I've been looking for some time for this type of coffee mat. Perfect size for my coffee maker, and cups. Mat is very absorbent, washes well. I easily slide it on my countertop to fill the coffee maker. Very satisfied, thank you!

reviews.reviewTitle: Makes moving my espresso machine easy, and soaks up little drips
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE: Easy to wash coffee out of it. I use dish soap and rinse, wring and lay flat to dry. The wringing has caused it to become misshapen, but it gets clean and still works as intended.I give 5 star rating when price:quality:functionality is equal. This product meets that standard.I have a large espresso machine and low hanging cabinets, so while it just barely fits in it's space, it has to be pulled out to refill beans or water. This has been a hassle, because the machine shimmies as you pull it, and water sloshes from the tank.This little mat, with it's cute little drawings, is exactly what I needed to fix that issue. The front of my machine rests on the felt mat, and now I can slide the machine out from under the cabinets effortlessly. The rest of the mat covers in front of the machine, to soak up drips and rest spoons.I'll update review if it does poorly in the washer/dryer once it gets too soiled.
